Body:
model = ComplEx(batches_count=1, seed=555, epochs=20, k=10, loss='pairwise',
    loss_params={'margin': 1}, regularizer='LP', regularizer_params={
    'lambda': 0.1, 'p': 2}, optimizer='adagrad', optimizer_params={'lr': 0.1})
X = np.array([['a', 'y', 'b'], ['b', 'y', 'a'], ['a', 'y', 'c'], ['c', 'y',
    'a'], ['a', 'y', 'd'], ['c', 'y', 'd'], ['b', 'y', 'c'], ['f', 'y', 'e']])
model.fit(X)
y_pred_1st = model.predict(np.array([['f', 'y', 'e'], ['b', 'y', 'd']]))
model.fit(X)
y_pred_2nd = model.predict(np.array([['f', 'y', 'e'], ['b', 'y', 'd']]))
np.testing.assert_array_equal(y_pred_1st, y_pred_2nd)
